constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 57 (Friday, March 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. KRISHNAMOORTHI:
H.R. 2232.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article 1 Section 8 of the U.S. Constitution
[Page H1693]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Committee on Education and Labor, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

title: Help Students Vote Act
